description.full: Selling in {{country}} gives you full access to all our services. If you want to know more about our services and how you can benefit from them click on one of the three services to begin.
description.noDropshipping: Selling in {{country}} gives you access to all our services except dropshipping. If you want to know more about our services and how you can benefit from them click on one of the three services to begin.

reviews.title: What our Customers have to say

about.title: About Zambeel
about.description: Zambeel is a commerce platform that provides sellers with the tools, automation, and fulfillment options they need to build and scale their online businesses. Whether you're just starting out or looking to expand, Zambeel offers solutions that make e-commerce accessible and profitable.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.text: To empower sellers with an accessible, intelligent, and local-first platform that makes online selling simple and genuinely profitable.

smartTools.title: Smart Selling Tools
smartTools.desc: Our AI-powered tools help you evaluate products, understand demand, build your store, get instant support, gain insights, and automate workflows. Everything you need to sell smarter and scale faster.

fulfillment.title: Flexible Fulfillment Options
fulfillment.desc: Choose from dropshipping, 3PL, or our comprehensive 360 brand building solution. We handle storage, packaging, and delivery so you can focus on growing your business.

localSolutions.title: Local Solutions for Local Sellers
localSolutions.desc: We understand the Pakistani market and the unique challenges you face. From payment constraints to logistics reliability, we've built solutions that work for local sellers.

whyZambeel.title: Why Zambeel?
whyZambeel.subtitle: Start your Ecommerce business from anywhere in the world without business registration.

dropshipping.title: Zambeel Dropshipping
dropshipping.desc: Start your Ecommerce business from anywhere in the world without business registration.

cod.title: Cash on Delivery
cod.desc: No need for payment gateway. You can start and scale your business with Cash on Delivery.

ai.title: AI Enabled Economy
ai.desc: Use our AI tools to make your work easier and more efficient.

support.title: Dedicated Support
support.desc: Get dedicated expert support from day one.

team.title: Meet the Team
team.subtitle: The team behind Zambeel's mission to simplify e-commerce.

hero.title: Zambeel Dropshipping
hero.subtitle: Start Dropshipping in Largest COD Markets

whyZambeel.title: Why Dropshipping with Zambeel?
whyZambeel.description: Start selling without inventory or business registration hassles. Launch your AI-powered store in under 3 minutes, get personalised guidance, and access 20K+ winning products to succeed in UAE & KSA with Zambeel Dropshipping.

pricing.title: Clear Pricing. Great Value.
pricing.subtitle: Click on any plan to see full details and features.

deliveryCharges.title: Dropshipping Delivery Charges
deliveryCharges.subtitle: Transparent pricing for all your dropshipping deliveries

carousel.allDone: Sourcing, Custom Clearance & Delivery- All done by Zambeel
carousel.allInSolution: All in solution for your E-commerce

whatIs.title: What is Zambeel 360?
whatIs.description: We sourced high quality products from trusted suppliers in China. Our end-to-end service includes product sourcing, quality control, shipping logistics, and customs clearance, making it easy for you to focus on growing your business.

whereToStart.title: Where to Start?
whereToStart.description: Getting started with Zambeel's 360 service is easy. Follow these simple steps to begin your journey with Zambeel.

bookConsultation.title: Book Consultation
bookConsultation.desc: Contact us through our Whatsapp number and our senior business consultant will get in touch with you.

sendInventory.title: Send Inventory
sendInventory.desc: Our team will share the product and shipping cost with you. Once you approve, we will send you a payment link.

connectStore.title: Connect Store
connectStore.desc: We will source your product and handle all shipping logistics to our warehouse.

startSelling.title: Start Selling
startSelling.desc: Integrate your online store with us through Shopify, Youcan, Easyorders & Lightfunnels or use Zambeel portal manually.

pricing.title: Our pricing is clear and transparent
pricing.subtitle: Click on any plan to see full details and features.

deliveryCharges.title: Zambeel 360 Delivery Charges
deliveryCharges.subtitle: Comprehensive pricing across all supported regions

hero.title: Zambeel 3PL
hero.subtitle: Get warehousing, inventory management & efficient fulfillment

carousel.fastDelivery: Fast delivery and smooth business operations
carousel.scale: Scale your business without the complexity.

whyZambeel.title: Why 3PL with Zambeel?
whyZambeel.description: From warehousing to last-mile delivery, Zambeel's 3PL service ensures live tracking of your orders and inventory, faster shipping and smoother operations.

whereToStart.title: Where to Start?
whereToStart.description: Getting started with Zambeel's 3PL service is easy. Follow these simple steps to begin your journey with Zambeel.

bookConsultation.title: Book Consultation
bookConsultation.desc: Contact us through our Whatsapp number and our senior business consultant will get in touch with you.

sendInventory.title: Send Inventory
sendInventory.desc: Our team will share the product and shipping cost with you. Once you approve, we will send you a payment link.

connectStore.title: Connect Store
connectStore.desc: We will source your product and handle all shipping logistics to our warehouse.

startSelling.title: Start Selling
startSelling.desc: Integrate your online store with us through Shopify, Youcan, Easyorders & Lightfunnels or use Zambeel portal manually.

pricing.title: Our pricing is clear and transparent
pricing.subtitle: Click on any plan to see full details and features.

deliveryCharges.title: 3PL Services Delivery Charges
deliveryCharges.subtitle: Competitive pricing for all your fulfillment needs

deliveryCharges.orderConfirmation: Order Confirmation + Followup / Order Packing / Delivery
deliveryCharges.failedDelivery: In case of failed delivery, only 'Return' will be charged
deliveryCharges.outskirtAreas: In some outskirt areas, delivery charges can be greater too. This happens on 3% of the orders only.
deliveryCharges.warehousingFree: Warehousing is FREE for first 2 months, after this 1AED/item/Month will be charged on unsold inventory

whereToStart.title: How to Start?
whereToStart.description: From AI-built stores, winning products, and personalized assistance, we provide everything you need to start selling under 30 minutes.

createAccount.title: Create account
createAccount.desc: Sign up in seconds and access your Zambeel dashboard instantly.

connectStore.title: Connect store
connectStore.desc: Link Shopify, YouCan, EasyOrders store, or upload orders manually.

listProducts.title: List Products
listProducts.desc: Choose from 20K+ products and set your own selling price — your profit is the difference.

startSelling.title: Start Selling
startSelling.desc: Promote your store on Facebook, Instagram, or any platform you like.

hero.title: Learn E-commerce with Zambeel
hero.description: We offer master ecommerce class every week in which we help you to understand and learn ecommerce
